SUMMARY: Utilities to access MS-DOS disks without mounting them
DESCRIPTION: Mtools is a collection of utilities to access MS-DOS disks from GNU and Unix without mounting them.
RRECOMMENDS_${PN}: 	glibc-gconv-ibm437 	glibc-gconv-ibm737 	glibc-gconv-ibm775 	glibc-gconv-ibm851 	glibc-gconv-ibm852 	glibc-gconv-ibm855 	glibc-gconv-ibm857 	glibc-gconv-ibm860 	glibc-gconv-ibm861 	glibc-gconv-ibm862 	glibc-gconv-ibm863 	glibc-gconv-ibm865 	glibc-gconv-ibm866 	glibc-gconv-ibm869 
